trans-unit.source: Dynamic: Yes, (except when globally set to 0 or -1)
trans-unit.target: 动态：是（全局设置为 0 或 -1 时除外）

trans-unit.source: Elapsed – Elapsed time for a give step.
trans-unit.target: 经过的时间–给定步骤的经过时间。

trans-unit.source: Environment Variables: If you are calling mysql-test-run.pl indirectly (i.e from a script or program such as buildbot) you can set MTR_STOP_FILE and MTR_STOP_KEEP_ALIVE.
trans-unit.target: 环境变量：如果您是间接调用mysql-test-run.pl（即从脚本或程序，例如buildbot），则可以设置 MTR_STOP_FILE 和 MTR_STOP_KEEP_ALIVE 。

trans-unit.source: Error Number (errNo) - The IDB error number if this query failed, 0 if it succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 错误号（errNo） -如果此查询失败，则为IDB错误号，如果成功，则为0。

trans-unit.source: Execute Multi-Join - Apply one or more hash join operation against projected join column(s) and use that value to probe a previously built hash map. Build out tuples as need to satisfy inner or outer join requirements. Note: Depending on the size of the previously built hash map, the actual join behavior may be executed either on the server running PM processes, or the server running UM processes. In either case, the Batch Primitive Step is functionally identical. See multi table join section of performance configuration for additional details on tuning this.
trans-unit.target: 执行多联接 -对投影联接列应用一个或多个哈希联接操作，并使用该值探测以前构建的哈希图。根据需要建立元组，以满足内部或外部连接要求。注意：根据先前构建的哈希图的大小，实际的联接行为可以在运行PM进程的服务器或运行UM进程的服务器上执行。在这两种情况下，批处理基本步骤在功能上都是相同的。有关调整此设置的更多详细信息，请参见性能配置的“多表连接”部分。

trans-unit.source: FEDERATED(X): The main limitation of FEDERATED is to access only MySQL/MariaDB tables. The MYSQL table type of CONNECT has the same limitation but CONNECT provides the ODBC table type and JDBC table type that can access tables of any RDBS providing an ODBC or JDBC driver (including MySQL even it is not really useful!)
trans-unit.target: FEDERATED（X）：FEDERATED的主要限制是只能访问MySQL / MariaDB表。 CONNECT的MYSQL表类型具有相同的限制，但是CONNECT提供了ODBC表类型和JDBC表类型，它们可以访问任何提供ODBC或JDBC驱动程序的RDBS的表（包括MySQL，即使它不是真的有用！）

trans-unit.source: FILE I/O: InnoDB thread information as well as pending I/O operations and I/O performance statistics.
trans-unit.target: 文件I / O： InnoDB线程信息以及未决的I / O操作和I / O性能统计信息。

trans-unit.source: FORCE: Runs the recovery even if it determines that more than one row from the data file will be lost.
trans-unit.target: FORCE：即使确定丢失了数据文件中的多行，也将运行恢复。

trans-unit.source: Fast Rollback and Recovery: PBXT uses a specialized method to identify garbage which makes "undo" unnecessary. This make both rollback of transactions and recovery after restart very fast.
trans-unit.target: 快速回滚和恢复： PBXT使用一种特殊的方法来识别垃圾，从而使“撤消”变得不必要。这使得事务回滚和重新启动后的恢复都非常快。

trans-unit.source: Field 1 is an integer (%d) with eventual leading blanks.
trans-unit.target: 字段1是一个整数（ %d ），最后带有前导空格。

trans-unit.source: Field 2 is separated from field 1 by optional blanks, a comma, and other optional blanks and is between single quotes. The leading quote is included in component 1 of the column format, followed by the %n marker. The column value is specified as %[^'] meaning to keep any characters read until a quote is met. The ending marker (%n) is followed by the 5th component of the column format, the single quote that follows the column value.
trans-unit.target: 字段2通过可选的空格，逗号和其他可选的空格与字段1分开，并且在单引号之间。引号包含在列格式的组件1中，后跟 %n 标记。列值指定为 %[^'] ,表示保留所有字符，直到遇到引号为止。结束标记（ %n ）之后是列格式的第5个组成部分，其后是列值的单引号。

trans-unit.source: Field 3, also separated by a comma, is a number preceded by a pound sign.
trans-unit.target: 字段3（也用逗号分隔）是一个数字，后跟井号。

trans-unit.source: Field 4, separated by a semicolon eventually surrounded by blanks, is a number with an optional decimal point (%f).
trans-unit.target: 字段4，以分号分隔，最后用空格包围，是一个带有可选小数点（ %f ）的数字。

trans-unit.source: First case: If no specific options are specified, this is an error an when trying to display the table. The query will abort with an error message stating that a non-matching value was met. Note that because the column list is established when creating the table, this is prone to occur if some rows containing new values for the pivot column are inserted in the source table. If this happens, you should re-create the table or manually add the new columns to the pivot table.
trans-unit.target: 第一种情况：如果未指定任何特定选项，则在尝试显示该表时出现错误。查询将中止，并显示一条错误消息，指出已满足不匹配的值。请注意，由于列列表是在创建表时建立的，因此如果在源表中插入一些包含数据透视表列新值的行，则容易发生这种情况。如果发生这种情况，则应重新创建表或将新列手动添加到数据透视表中。

trans-unit.source: Flexibility. Let's say we need to see all clients even if they don't have a phone number in the system. With the second version, it's easy; just change INNER JOIN phoneNumbers to LEFT JOIN phoneNumbers. Try that with the first version, and MySQL version 5.0.12+ will issue a syntax error because of the change in precedence between the comma operator and the JOIN keyword. The solution is to rearrange the FROM clause or add parentheses to override the precedence, and that quickly becomes frustrating.
trans-unit.target: 灵活性。假设我们需要查看所有客户端，即使他们在系统中没有电话号码也是如此。使用第二个版本，很容易；只需将 INNER JOIN phoneNumbers 更改为 LEFT JOIN phoneNumbers 即可。尝试使用第一个版本，由于逗号运算符和JOIN关键字之间的优先级更改，MySQL 5.0.12+版将发出语法错误。解决方案是重新排列FROM子句或添加括号以覆盖优先级，这很快就令人感到沮丧。

trans-unit.source: Fully ACID compliant: This means that all transactions are: atomic, consistent, isolated and durable.
trans-unit.target: 完全符合ACID：这意味着所有事务都是：原子的，一致的，隔离的和持久的。

trans-unit.source: GCS framework provides plugin architecture for group communication systems
trans-unit.target: GCS框架为群组通信系统提供了插件架构

trans-unit.source: Galera Replication Port (default: 4567) - For Galera Cluster replication traffic, multicast replication uses both UDP transport and TCP on this port. Can be changed by setting wsrep_node_address.
trans-unit.target: Galera复制端口（默认：4567）-对于Galera群集复制通信，多播复制在此端口上同时使用UDP传输和TCP。可以通过设置 wsrep_node_address 进行更改。

HJS - Hash Join Step : Performing a hash join between 2 tables
trans-unit.target: HJS-哈希联接步骤：在2个表之间执行哈希联接

trans-unit.source: HVS - Having Step: Performing the having clause on the result set
trans-unit.target: HVS-具有步骤：对结果集执行hading子句

trans-unit.source: Host (host) - The host that executed the statement.
trans-unit.target: 主机（主机） -执行该语句的主机。

trans-unit.source: INSERT BUFFER AND ADAPTIVE HASH INDEX: InnoDB insert buffer and adaptive hash index status information, including the number of each type of operation performed, and adaptive hash index performance.
trans-unit.target: 插入缓冲区和自适应哈希索引： InnoDB插入缓冲区和自适应哈希索引状态信息，包括执行的每种类型操作的数量以及自适应哈希索引性能。

trans-unit.target: IST端口（默认：4568）-用于增量状态传输。可以通过在 wsrep_provider_options 中设置 ist.recv_addr 进行更改。

trans-unit.source: Important: Do not use Cygwin bash, MinGW bash, Git bash, WSL bash, or any other bash when running the test suite. You will then very likely use the wrong version of Perl too (a "Unix-flavoured" one on Windows), and spend a lot of time trying to figure out why this version of Perl does not work for the test suite. Use native perl, in cmd.exe , or powershell instead,

trans-unit.source: JPDB Admin for MariaDB is a tool for managing and developing with MariaDB, MySQL and Percona Server. It allows one to visually create tables, views, triggers and other structures.
trans-unit.target: JPDB Admin for MariaDB是用于使用MariaDB，MySQL和Percona Server进行管理和开发的工具。它允许人们直观地创建表，视图，触发器和其他结构。

trans-unit.source: JPDB Admin for MariaDB, has free and trial versions and is available in seven languages​​: Chinese, English, German, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish. It is also runs on Windows, Linux GTK2 or QT, with DEB and RPM packages and tar.gz binaries, as well as 32bits or 64bits.
trans-unit.target: JPDB Admin for MariaDB拥有免费和试用版，并提供七种语言版本：中文，英语，德语，日语，葡萄牙语，俄语和西班牙语。它还可以在Windows，Linux GTK2或QT上运行，并带有DEB和RPM软件包以及tar.gz二进制文件以及32位或64位。

trans-unit.source: LATEST DETECTED DEADLOCK: Only shown if there has been a deadlock, it displays the transactions involved in the deadlock and the statements being executed, held and required locked and the transaction rolled back to.
trans-unit.target: 最新检测到的死锁：仅在出现死锁时才显示，它显示死锁中涉及的事务以及正在执行，保持和要求锁定的语句，并将事务回滚。

trans-unit.source: LATEST FOREIGN KEY ERROR: Only shown if there has been a foreign key constraint error, it displays the failed statement and information about the constraint and the related tables.
trans-unit.target: 最新外键错误：仅在出现外键约束错误时显示，它显示失败的语句以及有关约束和相关表的信息。

trans-unit.source: LIO – Logical I/O executed for the query, also known as Blocks Touched.
trans-unit.target: LIO –为查询执行的逻辑I / O，也称为“接触的块”。

trans-unit.source: LOG: InnoDB log information, including current log sequence number, how far the log has been flushed to disk, the position at which InnoDB last took a checkpoint, pending writes and write performance statistics.

trans-unit.source: MERGE: Its limitation is obvious, the merged tables must be identical MyISAM tables, and MyISAM is not even the default engine for MariaDB. However, TBL accesses a collection of CONNECT tables, but because these tables can be user specified or internally created MYSQL tables, there is no limitation to the type of the tables that can be merged.
trans-unit.target: 合并：其局限性显而易见，合并的表必须是相同的MyISAM表，而且MyISAM甚至不是MariaDB的默认引擎。但是，TBL访问CONNECT表的集合，但是由于可以由用户指定这些表或在内部创建MYSQL表，因此对可以合并的表的类型没有限制。

trans-unit.source: MVCC Support: MVCC stands for Multi-version Concurrency Control. MVCC allows reading the database without locking.
trans-unit.target: MVCC支持： MVCC表示多版本并发控制。MVCC允许读取数据库而无需锁定。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Platform X3 responds to business design challenges by integrating:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Platform X3通过集成以下内容来应对业务设计挑战：

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup is an open source tool provided by MariaDB for performing physical online backups of InnoDB, Aria and MyISAM tables. For InnoDB, “hot online” backups are possible. It was originally forked from Percona XtraBackup 2.3.8. It is available on Linux and Windows.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup是MariaDB提供的开源工具，用于执行InnoDB，Aria和MyISAM表的物理在线备份。对于InnoDB，可以进行“热在线”备份。它最初是从Percona XtraBackup 2.3.8 分叉的。它在Linux和Windows上可用。

trans-unit.source: MaxMemPct - Peak memory utilization on the User Module, likely in support of a large (User Module) based hash join operation.
trans-unit.target: MaxMemPct- 用户模块上的峰值内存利用率，可能支持基于大型（用户模块）的哈希联接操作。

trans-unit.source: Memory Utilization (maxMemPct) - This field shows memory utilization for the User Module (UM) in support of any UM join, group by, aggregation, distinct, or other operation.
trans-unit.target: 内存使用率（maxMemPct） -此字段显示用户模块（UM）的内存使用率，以支持任何UM 联接，分组，聚合，不同或其他操作。

trans-unit.source: Messages from UM to PM (msgOutUM) - The number of messages in bytes that ExeMgr sends to the PrimProc. If a message needs to be distributed to all the PMs, the sum of all the distributed messages will be counted. Only valid for queries that are processed by ExeMgr, i.e. SELECT, DML with WHERE clause, and INSERT SELECT.
trans-unit.target: 从UM到PM的消息（msgOutUM） -ExeMgr发送到PrimProc的消息的字节数。如果需要将一条消息分发给所有PM，则将计算所有已分发消息的总和。仅对由ExeMgr处理的查询有效，即SELECT，带有WHERE子句的DML和INSERT SELECT。

trans-unit.source: Messages from PM to UM (msgInUM) - The number of messages in bytes that PrimProc sends to the ExeMgr. Only valid for queries that are processed by ExeMgr, i.e. SELECT, DML with where clause, and INSERT SELECT.
trans-unit.target: 从PM到UM的消息（msgInUM） -PrimProc发送到ExeMgr的消息的字节数。仅对由ExeMgr处理的查询有效，即SELECT，带有where子句的DML和INSERT SELECT。

trans-unit.source: Mode – Where the operation was performed: UM or PM
MsgBytesIn, MsgByteOut - Message size in MB sent between nodes in support of the query.
trans-unit.target: MsgBytesIn，MsgByteOut-支持查询的节点之间发送的邮件大小（以MB为单位）。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When LIMIT is applied on a nested query's results, and the inner query contains ORDER BY, LIMIT is applied first and then ORDER BY is applied.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当对嵌套查询的结果应用LIMIT，并且内部查询包含ORDER BY时，将首先应用LIMIT，然后再应用ORDER BY。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When ORDER BY is used in an inner query and LIMIT on an outer query, LIMIT is applied first and then ORDER BY is applied when returning results.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果在内部查询中使用ORDER BY，而在外部查询中使用LIMIT，则首先应用LIMIT，然后在返回结果时应用ORDER BY。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: the MySQL engine type of 'infinidb' is still supported in the MariaDB ColumnStore, so tables created as 'infinidb' will continue to work. But it is recommend that all new tables use be created using the engine type of 'columnstore'. If you do not recreate the tables you will get warnings in the MariaDB server log file that the FRM file is inconsistent and the typecode is incorrect. These warnings can be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 注意：MariaDB ColumnStore仍支持MySQL引擎类型“ infinidb”，因此创建为“ infinidb”的表将继续工作。但是建议使用引擎类型为“ columnstore”的所有新表。如果不重新创建表，您将在MariaDB服务器日志文件中收到警告，指出FRM文件不一致并且类型代码不正确。这些警告可以忽略。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: For MariaDB 5.1.32only the line "./scripts/mysql_install_db --user=mysql" should be changed to "./bin/mysql_install_db --user=mysql"

NOTE: If you are doing more extensive testing or debugging of MariaDB (like with real application data and workloads) you may want to start and run MariaDB directly from the source directory instead of installing it with 'sudo make install'. If so, see Running MariaDB from the Source Directory.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您要对MariaDB进行更广泛的测试或调试（例如使用实际的应用程序数据和工作负载），则可能要直接从源目录启动和运行MariaDB，而不是使用' sudo make install ' 进行安装。如果是这样，请参阅从源目录运行MariaDB。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: By default, if you install a database instance, the data directory will be in the "data" folder under the installation root. To change the data directory location, select "Database instance" in the feature tree, and use the "Browse" button to point to another place.
trans-unit.target: 注意：默认情况下，如果您安装数据库实例，则数据目录将位于安装根目录下的“ data”文件夹中。要更改数据目录位置，请在功能树中选择“数据库实例”，然后使用“浏览”按钮指向另一个位置。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: The install and setup had you install the packages on the node designed as Performance Module #1, 'pm1'. This is where the install script is run from, 'pm1'
trans-unit.target: 注意：安装和设置是否已将软件包安装在设计为性能模块＃1'pm1'的节点上。这是从“ pm1”运行安装脚本的地方

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You can install MariaDB ColumnStore as a root user or non-root user. This is based on how you setup the servers based on "Preparing for Installation Document". If installing as root, you need to be logged in as root user in a root login shell. If you are installing as non-root, you need to be logged in as a non-root user that was setup in the "Preparing for Installation Document".
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以以root用户或非root用户身份安装MariaDB ColumnStore。这基于您基于“准备安装文档”来设置服务器的方式。如果以root用户身份安装，则需要以root用户身份登录root登录shell。如果要以非root用户身份安装，则需要以在“准备安装文档”中设置的非root用户身份登录。

trans-unit.source: Name: The name of a table, the name of an internal buffer, or the performance_schema word, followed by a dot and an attribute. Internal buffers names are enclosed by parenthesis. performance_schema means that the attribute refers to the whole database (it is a total).
trans-unit.target: 名称：表的名称，内部缓冲区的名称或 performance_schema 单词，后跟一个点和一个属性。内部缓冲区名称用括号括起来。 performance_schema 表示该属性引用了整个数据库（它是一个总数）。

trans-unit.source: Name: The source file where the mutex is implemented, and the line number in the file where the mutex is created. The line number is dependent on the MariaDB version.
trans-unit.target: 名称：实现互斥锁的源文件，以及创建互斥锁的文件中的行号。行号取决于MariaDB版本。

trans-unit.source: Note 1: Because the formats are specified between quotes, quotes belonging to the formats must be doubled or escaped to avoid a CREATE TABLE statement syntax error.
trans-unit.target: 注1：因为格式是在引号之间指定的，所以必须将属于格式的引号加倍或转义，以避免 CREATE TABLE 语句语法错误。

trans-unit.source: Note 1: Creating a CONNECT table based on file does not erase or create the file if the file name is specified in the CREATE TABLE statement (“outward” table). If the file does not exist, it will be populated by subsequent INSERT or LOAD commands or by the “AS select statement” of the CREATE TABLE command. Unlike the CSV engine, CONNECT easily permits the creation of tables based on already existing files, for instance files made by other applications. However, if the file name is not specified, a file with a name defaulting to tablename.tabletype will be created in the data directory (“inward” table).
trans-unit.target: 注意1：如果在CREATE TABLE语句（“向外”表）中指定了文件名，则基于文件创建CONNECT表不会删除或创建文件。如果该文件不存在，它将由随后的INSERT或LOAD命令或CREATE TABLE命令的“ AS select语句”填充。与CSV引擎不同，CONNECT可以轻松地基于现有文件（例如由其他应用程序生成的文件）创建表。但是，如果未指定文件名，则将在数据目录（“内部”表）中创建名称默认为 tablename.tabletype 的文件。

trans-unit.source: Note 1: Here, field_length=20 was necessary because the default size for datetime columns is only 19. The lrecl=400 was also specified because the actual file contains more information in each records making the record size calculated by default too small.
trans-unit.target: 注意1：在这里， field_length=20 是必需的，因为datetime列的默认大小仅为19。还指定了 lrecl=400 ，因为实际文件中的每条记录都包含更多信息，从而使默认情况下计算出的记录大小过小。

trans-unit.source: Note 1: If only the QCHAR option is specified, the QUOTED option will default to 1.
trans-unit.target: 注1：如果仅指定QCHAR选项，则QUOTED选项将默认为1。

trans-unit.source: Note 1: It is not mandatory to declare in the table all the fields existing in the source file. However, if some fields are ignored, the flag option of the following field and/or the lrecl option will have to be specified.

trans-unit.source: Note 1: The WMI table type is available only in Windows versions of CONNECT.

trans-unit.source: Note 1: to avoid multiple lines having the same fixed column values, it is mandatory in SrcDef to place the pivot column at the end of the group by list.

trans-unit.target: 注意2：命令中的反斜杠必须转义。如果在单引号之间指定命令，则必须转义单引号；如果在双引号之间指定命令，则必须转义双引号。

trans-unit.source: Note 2: Because sections represent one line, a DELETE statement on a section key will delete the whole section.
trans-unit.target: 注意2：由于节代表一行，所以在节键上的DELETE语句将删除整个节。

trans-unit.source: Note 2: Because the OccurCol was declared "not null" no rows were generated for null or pseudo-null values of the column list. If the OccurCol is declared as nullable, rows are also generated for columns containing null or pseudo-null values.
trans-unit.target: 注2：因为OccurCol被声明为“不为空”，所以没有为列列表的null或伪null值生成任何行。如果OccurCol被声明为可为空，则还会为包含null或伪null值的列生成行。

trans-unit.source: Note 2: Characters separating columns can be included as well in component 5 of the preceding column format or in component 1 of the succeeding column format but for blanks, which should be always included in component 1 of the succeeding column format because line trailing blanks can be sometimes lost. This is also mandatory for optional fields.
trans-unit.target: 注2：分隔列的字符也可以包含在前一列格式的组件5或后一列格式的组件1中，但对于空格，应始终包含在后列格式的组件1中，因为行尾空格可以有时会迷路。这对于可选字段也是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Note 2: Dropping a CONNECT table is done with a standard DROP statement. For outward tables, this drops only the CONNECT table definition but does not erase the corresponding data file and index files. Use DELETE or TRUNCATE to do so. This is contrary to data and index files of inward tables are erased on DROP like for other MariaDB engines.
trans-unit.target: 注2：删除CONNECT表是使用标准DROP语句完成的。对于向外表，这仅会删除CONNECT表定义，而不会删除相应的数据文件和索引文件。使用 DELETE 或 TRUNCATE 执行此操作。这与其他MariaDB引擎一样，在DROP上删除了内向表的数据和索引文件。

trans-unit.target: 注意2：对于分隔符为制表符的CSV表，请指定 sep_char='\t' 。

trans-unit.target: 注4：当前，所有命令都在AUTOCOMMIT模式下执行。

trans-unit.source: Note : to create a Windows service, mysql_install_db.exe should be run by a user with full administrator privileges (which means elevated command prompt on systems with UAC). For example, if you are running it on Windows 7, make sure that your command prompt was launched via 'Run as Administrator' option.
trans-unit.target: 注意：要创建Windows服务， mysql_install_db.exe 应该由具有完全管理员特权的用户运行（这意味着在具有UAC的系统上具有增强的命令提示符）。例如，如果您在Windows 7上运行它，请确保通过“以管理员身份运行”选项启动了命令提示符。

trans-unit.source: Note1: Indexed columns must be declared NOT NULL; CONNECT doesn't support indexes containing null values.
trans-unit.target: 注意1：必须将索引列声明为NOT NULL；CONNECT不支持包含空值的索引。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using disk-based joins, it is strongly recommended that the TempFilePath reside on its own partition as the partition may fill up as queries are executed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用基于磁盘的联接时，强烈建议将TempFilePath驻留在其自己的分区上，因为在执行查询时该分区可能会填满。

trans-unit.source: Note: A special case is files having an encoding such as UTF-8 (for instance specifying charset=UTF8) in which some characters may be represented with several bytes. Unlike the type size that MariaDB interprets as a number of characters, the lrecl value is the record size in bytes and the flag value represents the offset of the field in the record in bytes. If the flag and/or the lrecl value are not specified, they will be calculated by the number of characters in the fields multiplied by a value that is the maximum size in bytes of a character for the corresponding charset. For UTF-8 this value is 3 which is often far too much as there are very few characters requiring 3 bytes to be represented. When creating a new file, you are on the safe side by only doubling the maximum number of characters of a field to calculate the offset of the next field. Of course, for already existing files, the offset must be specified according to what it is in it.
trans-unit.target: 注意：特殊情况是具有诸如UTF-8（例如，指定 charset=UTF8 ）之类的编码的文件，其中某些字符可以用几个字节表示。与MariaDB解释为多个字符的类型大小不同， lrecl 值是记录大小（以字节为单位），标志值代表记录中字段的偏移量（以字节为单位）。如果标志和/或 lrecl 如果未指定value，则将通过字段中的字符数乘以对应字符集的最大字符大小（以字节为单位）的值来计算。对于UTF-8，此值为3，通常太高，因为很少有字符需要表示3个字节。创建新文件时，为了安全起见，只需将一个字段的最大字符数加倍以计算下一个字段的偏移量即可。当然，对于已经存在的文件，必须根据其中的偏移量指定偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Note: ALL includes the ODBC, JDBC, MYSQL, DBF, CSV, PROXY, TBL, XML, JSON, XCOL, and WMI table types. More could be added later.
trans-unit.target: 注意： ALL包括ODBC，JDBC，MYSQL，DBF，CSV，PROXY，TBL，XML，JSON，XCOL和WMI表类型。以后可以添加更多。

trans-unit.source: Note: All PROXY or PROXY-based tables are read-only in this version.

trans-unit.source: Note: Although it is called a "buffer", the Version Buffer uses both memory and disk structures.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管版本缓冲区被称为“缓冲区”，但它同时使用内存和磁盘结构。

trans-unit.source: Note: Because MariaDB uses the C escape syntax in strings (for example, "\n" to represent the newline character), you must double any "\" that you use in your REGEXP strings.
trans-unit.target: 注意：因为MariaDB在字符串中使用C转义语法（例如，“ \ n”表示换行符），所以必须对REGEXP字符串中使用的任何“ \”加倍。

trans-unit.source: Note: CONNECT does not currently support auto incremented columns. However, a ROWID special column will do the job of a column auto incremented by 1.
trans-unit.target: 注意： CONNECT当前不支持自动递增的列。但是， ROWID 特殊列将执行自动递增1的列的工作。

trans-unit.source: Note: For DBF tables, column name length is limited to 11 characters and field length to 256 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于DBF表，列名长度限制为11个字符，字段长度限制为256个字节。

The declared column precision should be at least the number of decimals of the format to avoid a loss of decimals as it happened for col3 of the above example.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于内部使用双精度浮点数的列，MariaDB将任何计算的十进制精度限制为列精度。声明的列精度应至少为该格式的小数位数，以避免上面示例的 col3 发生小数位数丢失。

trans-unit.target: 注意：如果未指定，则从表列表的第一个表中检索列定义。

trans-unit.source: Note: MariaDB accepts the REFERENCES clause in ALTER TABLE and CREATE TABLE column definitions, but that syntax does nothing. Only the syntax for indexes described below creates foreign keys.

trans-unit.source: Note: Since MariaDB 5.1, if the READ COMMITTED isolation level is used or the innodb_locks_unsafe_for_binlog system variable is enabled, there is no InnoDB gap locking except for foreign-key constraint checking and duplicate-key checking. Also, record locks for non-matching rows are released after MariaDB has evaluated the WHERE condition. As of MariaDB/MySQL 5.1, if you use READ COMMITTED or enable innodb_locks_unsafe_for_binlog, you must use row-based binary logging.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从MariaDB 5.1开始，如果使用了 READ COMMITTED 隔离级别或启用了 innodb_locks_unsafe_for_binlog 系统变量，则除了外键约束检查和重复键检查之外，没有InnoDB间隙锁定。同样，在MariaDB评估 WHERE 条件之后，将释放不匹配行的记录锁。从MariaDB / MySQL 5.1开始，如果您使用 READ COMMITTED 或启用innodb_locks_unsafe_for_binlog，则必须使用基于行的二进制日志记录。

These binaries are built the same as the others, but on a newer build host, and they require GLIBC 2.14 or higher. Use the other binaries for machines with older versions of GLIBC installed. Run ldd --version to see which version is running on your distribution.
trans-unit.target: 注意：一些二进制压缩文件标记为'（GLIBC_2.14）'或'（需要GLIBC_2.14 +）'。这些二进制文件的构建方式与其他二进制文件相同，但位于更新的生成主机上，并且它们需要GLIBC 2.14或更高版本。对于安装了旧版本GLIBC的计算机，请使用其他二进制文件。运行 ldd --version 以查看您的发行版上正在运行哪个版本。

trans-unit.source: Note: The XML document encoding is generally specified in the XML header node and can be different from the DATA_CHARSET, which is always UTF-8 for XML tables. Therefore the table DATA_CHARSET character set should be unspecified, or specified as UTF8. The Encoding specification is useful only for new XML files and ignored for existing files having their encoding already specified in the header node.
trans-unit.target: 注意： XML文档编码通常在XML标头节点中指定，并且可以与DATA_CHARSET不同，DATA_CHARSET对于XML表始终为UTF-8。因此，表DATA_CHARSET字符集应未指定，或指定为UTF8。编码规范仅对新的XML文件有用，而对于在头节点中已指定其编码的现有文件，则忽略。

trans-unit.source: Note: The compression ratio is incorrectly calculated before versions 1.0.12 / 1.1.2
trans-unit.target: 注意： 1.0.12 / 1.1.2版之前的压缩率计算不正确

trans-unit.source: Note: The field_length option exists because the MariaDB syntax does not allow specifying the field length between parentheses for temporal column types. If not specified, the field length is calculated from the date format (sometimes as a max value) or made equal to the default length value if there is no date format. In the above example it could have been removed as the calculated values are the ones specified. However, if the table type would have been DOS or FIX, these values could be adjusted to fit the actual field length within the file.
trans-unit.target: 注意：存在field_length选项是因为MariaDB语法不允许为时间列类型指定括号之间的字段长度。如果未指定，则根据日期格式（有时是最大值）计算字段长度，如果没有日期格式，则使其等于默认长度值。在上面的示例中，由于计算值是指定的值，因此可能已将其删除。但是，如果表类型是DOS或FIX，则可以调整这些值以适合文件中的实际字段长度。

trans-unit.source: Note: The information of columns having a Flag value less than 10 are unique for the computer, the other ones are specific to the network cards of the computer.
trans-unit.target: 注意：标志值小于10的列的信息对于计算机是唯一的，其他信息特定于计算机的网卡。

trans-unit.source: Note: The quotes around the table name are required, an error will occur without them.
trans-unit.target: 注意：表名周围的引号是必需的，如果没有引号，则会发生错误。

trans-unit.source: Note: The syntax of the CASE statement used inside stored programs differs slightly from that of the SQL CASE expression described in CASE OPERATOR. The CASE statement cannot have an ELSE NULL clause, and it is terminated with END CASE instead of END.
trans-unit.target: 注意：存储程序内部使用的 CASE 语句的语法与CASE OPERATOR中描述的SQL CASE表达式的语法略有不同。该 CASE 语句不能有 ELSE NULL 子句，并且它终止了与 END CASE 而不是 END 。

trans-unit.source: Note: There is also an IF statement which differs from the IF() function described here.
trans-unit.target: 注意：还有一个IF语句与这里描述的 IF() 函数不同。

trans-unit.target: 注意：此错误处理也适用于CSV表。

trans-unit.source: Note: Trailing spaces are removed when CHAR values are retrieved unless the PAD_CHAR_TO_FULL_LENGTHSQL mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 注意：除非启用了 PAD_CHAR_TO_FULL_LENGTH SQL模式，否则在检索 CHAR 值时将删除尾部空格。

trans-unit.source: Note: Triggers for a table are also dropped if you drop the table.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果删除表，则也会删除该表的触发器。

Note: We used a column list in the Insert statements when creating the table to avoid generating a <TRANSLATOR> node with sub-nodes, all containing null values (this works on Windows only).

trans-unit.source: Note: When MariaDB is installed manually (i.e. not using YUM), updates are not automatic. You will need to update the RPMs yourself.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当手动安装MariaDB（即不使用YUM）时，更新不是自动的。您将需要自己更新RPM。

trans-unit.target: 注意：将时间值转换为精度较低的值时，它将被截断而不是四舍五入。这样做是为了确保日期部分不会更改。例如：

trans-unit.source: Note: When you insert into an empty table with INSERT or LOAD DATA, MariaDB automatically does a DISABLE KEYS before and an ENABLE KEYS afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当您使用 INSERT 或 LOAD DATA 插入空表时，MariaDB会自动在之前执行 DISABLE KEYS ,然后在执行 ENABLE KEYS 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Windows does not support PAM, so the pam authentication plugin does not support Windows. However, one can use a MariaDB client on Windows to connect to MariaDB server that is installed on a Unix-like operating system and that is configured to use the pam authentication plugin. For an example of how to do this, see the blog post: MariaDB: Improve Security with Two-Step Verification.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Windows不支持PAM，因此 pam 身份验证插件不支持Windows。但是，可以在Windows上使用MariaDB客户端连接到安装在类Unix操作系统上且配置为使用 pam 身份验证插件的MariaDB服务器。有关如何执行此操作的示例，请参见博客文章：MariaDB：通过两步验证提高安全性。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can also use mysqladmin kill thread_id [,thread_id...] to kill connections. To get a list of running queries, use mysqladmin processlist. See mysqladmin.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您也可以使用 mysqladmin kill thread_id [,thread_id...] 连接。要获取正在运行的查询的列表，请使用 mysqladmin processlist 。参见mysqladmin。

trans-unit.source: Note: You cannot use KILL with the Embedded MySQL Server library because the embedded server merely runs inside the threads of the host application. It does not create any connection threads of its own.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不能将 KILL 与嵌入式MySQL服务器库一起使用，因为嵌入式服务器仅在主机应用程序的线程内运行。它不会自己创建任何连接线程。

trans-unit.source: Note: comments which have a version number in the range 50700..99999 that use MariaDB-style executable comment syntax are still executed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用MariaDB样式的可执行注释语法的版本号在 50700..99999 范围内的注释仍将执行。

trans-unit.source: Note: for multi-query statements to work, your client must specify the CLIENT_MULTI_STATEMENTS flag to mysql_real_connect().
trans-unit.target: 注意：为了使多查询语句正常工作，您的客户端必须为 mysql_real_connect() 指定 CLIENT_MULTI_STATEMENTS 标志。

trans-unit.source: Note: if the default_storage_engine is set to ColumnStore then it needs setting on all UMs. Otherwise when the tables using the default engine are replicated across UMs they will use the wrong engine. You should therefore not use this option as a session variable with ColumnStore.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果将default_storage_engine设置为ColumnStore，则需要在所有UM上进行设置。否则，当使用默认引擎的表跨UM复制时，它们将使用错误的引擎。因此，您不应将此选项用作ColumnStore的会话变量。

trans-unit.source: Note: the default values specified for the special columns do not mean anything. They are specified just to prevent getting warning messages when inserting new rows.
trans-unit.target: 注意：为特殊列指定的默认值没有任何意义。指定它们只是为了防止在插入新行时收到警告消息。

trans-unit.source: Note: the important item in this table is the flag option value (set sequentially from 0 by default) because it determines which particular information item is returned in the column:
trans-unit.target: 注意：此表中的重要项是标志选项值（默认情况下从0开始顺序设置），因为它确定在列中返回哪个特定信息项：

trans-unit.source: Note: the installation is silent due to msiexe.exe's /qn switch (no user interface), if you omit the switch, the installation will have the full UI.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于msiexe.exe的/ qn开关（无用户界面），安装处于静默状态，如果省略该开关，则安装将具有完整的UI。

trans-unit.source: Note:MariaDB 5.1 and later follow the standard SQL specification, and do not remove trailing spaces from VARCHAR values.
trans-unit.target: 注意：MariaDB 5.1和更高版本遵循标准SQL规范，并且请勿从VARCHAR值中删除尾随空格。

trans-unit.source: Note:DROP TABLE automatically commits the current active transaction, unless you use the TEMPORARY keyword.
trans-unit.target: 注意：除非您使用 TEMPORARY 关键字，否则 DROP TABLE 会自动提交当前活动事务。

trans-unit.source: Note:replicate_events_marked_for_skip is a dynamic variable (it can be changed without restarting the server), however the slave threads must be stopped when it is changed, otherwise an error will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 注意： replicate_events_marked_for_skip 是一个动态变量（可以在不重新启动服务器的情况下对其进行更改），但是更改它时必须停止从属线程，否则将引发错误。

trans-unit.source:
Note:This option can only be used when mysqldump/ is run on the same machine as the mysqld server. You must have the FILE privilege, and the server must have permission to write files in the directory that you specify.

By default, the .txt data files are formatted using tab characters between column values and a newline at the end of each line. The format can be specified explicitly using the --fields-xxx and --lines-terminated-by options.

Column values are converted to the character set specified by the --default-character-set option.
trans-unit.target:
注意：仅当 mysqldump /与mysqld服务器在同一台计算机上运行时，才能使用此选项。您必须具有 FILE 特权，并且服务器必须具有在指定目录中写入文件的权限。

默认情况下， .txt 数据文件使用列值之间的制表符和每行末尾的换行符格式化。可以使用 --fields-xxx 和 --lines-terminated-by 选项显式指定格式。

列值将转换为 --default-character-set 选项指定的字符集。

trans-unit.source: Note:Disk-based joins does not include aggregation and DML joins.
trans-unit.target: 注意：基于磁盘的联接不包括聚合和DML联接。

trans-unit.source: Note. Automatic upgrades are only possible for DB instances that run as a Windows service.
trans-unit.target: 注意。自动升级仅适用于作为Windows服务运行的数据库实例。

trans-unit.source: Note. This recommendation differs from the procedure on Unixes, where the upgrade sequence is "uninstall old version, install new version"
trans-unit.target: 注意。此建议与Unixes上的过程不同，在Unixes上，升级顺序为“卸载旧版本，安装新版本”。

trans-unit.source: Note: In practice, the Optimizer may rearrange the exact order in which MariaDB executes different parts of the statement. When it calculates the result-set, however, it returns values as though the parenthetical expression were executed first.
trans-unit.target: 注意：实际上，优化器可能会重新排列MariaDB执行语句不同部分的确切顺序。但是，当计算结果集时，它会返回值，就像先执行括号表达式一样。

trans-unit.source: Note: The OWNER option is currently not applied, and has no effect on the ownership or operation of the server connection that is created.
trans-unit.target: 注意： OWNER 选项当前未应用，并且对创建的服务器连接的所有权或操作没有影响。

trans-unit.source: Note: This release introduces a dependency on the jemalloc os library to resolve some memory management issues that can lead to memory leaks. On each ColumnStore you must install jemalloc:
trans-unit.target: 注意：此版本引入了对jemalloc os库的依赖关系，以解决一些可能导致内存泄漏的内存管理问题。在每个ColumnStore上，您必须安装jemalloc：

trans-unit.source: Notes: Changing the variable only affects new opened tables. Use FLUSH TABLES If you want it to affect also cached tables.
trans-unit.target: 注意：更改变量只会影响新打开的表。使用 FLUSH TABLES 如果希望它也影响缓存的表。

trans-unit.source: Notes: In MySQL the thread pool is only available in MySQL enterprise 5.5.16 and above. In MariaDB it's available in all versions.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在MySQL中，线程池仅在MySQL Enterprise 5.5.16及更高版本中可用。在MariaDB中，所有版本均可用。

trans-unit.source: Notes: The default maximum for a single server is 16Gb.
trans-unit.target: 注意：单个服务器的默认最大值是16Gb。

trans-unit.source: Notes: The installer will set up the number of dbroot directories based on this answer.
trans-unit.target: 注意：安装程序将根据此答案设置dbroot目录的数量。

trans-unit.source: Notes: You should give this system a name that will appear in various Admin utilities, SNMP messages, etc. The name can be composed of any number of printable characters and spaces.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您应该给该系统一个名称，该名称将出现在各种Admin实用程序，SNMP消息等中。该名称可以由任意数量的可打印字符和空格组成。

trans-unit.source: NumTempFiles - Report on any temporary files created in support of query operations larger than available memory, typically for unusual join operations where the smaller table join cardinality exceeds some configurable threshold.
trans-unit.target: NumTempFiles-报告为支持大于可用内存的查询操作而创建的任何临时文件，通常用于较小的表联接基数超过某个可配置阈值的异常联接操作。

trans-unit.source: OLD: MySQL <5.6.1 or MariaDB < 5.3.0 with no checksum capabilities
On systems that support systemd: The startup timeout can be increased by setting TimeoutStartSec systemd option.
trans-unit.target: 在支持systemd的系统上：可以通过设置TimeoutStartSec systemd选项来增加启动超时。

trans-unit.source: On systems where systemd is not enabled/supported: The timeout can be increased by setting MYSQLD_STARTUP_TIMEOUT either directly in the script or via the command line. In MariaDB 10.1.13 and later versions, the init script also sources /etc/default/mariadb, so it can also be used to set MYSQLD_STARTUP_TIMEOUT to persistently change the startup timeout. The default timeout has been increased from 30s to 60s in MariaDB 10.1.13.
trans-unit.target: 在未启用/不支持systemd的系统上：可以通过直接在脚本中或通过命令行设置MYSQLD_STARTUP_TIMEOUT来增加超时。在MariaDB 10.1.13和更高版本中，init脚本还会提供/ etc / default / mariadb的资源，因此它也可以用于设置MYSQLD_STARTUP_TIMEOUT来永久更改启动超时。在MariaDB 10.1.13中，默认超时已从30s增加到60s 。

trans-unit.source: PBE – Partition Blocks Eliminated identifies blocks eliminated by Extent Map min/max.
trans-unit.target: PBE –排除的分区块标识通过范围映射最小/最大值消除的块。

trans-unit.source: PIO – Physical I/O (reads from storage) executed for the query.
trans-unit.target: PIO –为查询执行的物理I / O（从存储读取）。

trans-unit.source: Partition Blocks Eliminated (CPBlocksSkipped) - The number of blocks being eliminated by the extent map casual partition. This statistic is only valid for queries that are processed by ExeMgr, i.e. SELECT, DML with WHERE clause, and INSERT SELECT.
trans-unit.target: 消除分区块（CPBlocksSkipped） -范围映射临时分区消除的块数。此统计信息仅对由ExeMgr处理的查询有效，即SELECT，带有WHERE子句的DML和INSERT SELECT。

trans-unit.source: PartitionBlocksEliminated - The number of block touches eliminated via the Extent Map elimination behavior.
trans-unit.target: PartitionBlocksEliminated-通过范围映射消除行为消除的块触摸数。

trans-unit.source: PhyI/O - Number of 8k blocks read from disk, SSD, or other persistent storage.
trans-unit.target: PhyI / O-从磁盘，SSD或其他持久性存储读取的8k块数。

trans-unit.source: Physical I/O (phyIO) - The number of blocks that the query accessed from the disk, including the pre-fetch blocks. This statistic is only valid for the queries that are processed by ExeMgr, i.e. SELECT, DML with WHERE clause, and INSERT SELECT.
trans-unit.target: 物理I / O（phyIO） -查询从磁盘访问的块数，包括预取块。该统计信息仅对ExeMgr处理的查询有效，即SELECT，带有WHERE子句的DML和INSERT SELECT。

trans-unit.source: Portability. The changes in 5.0.12 were made to align with SQL:2003. If your queries use standard syntax, you will have an easier time switching to a different database should the need ever arise.
trans-unit.target: 可移植性。5.0.12中所做的更改是为了与SQL：2003保持一致。如果查询使用标准语法，则在需要时可以更轻松地切换到其他数据库。

trans-unit.source: Priority (priority) The priority the user has for this statement.
trans-unit.target: 优先级（priority）用户对此语句的优先级。

trans-unit.source: Privileges indicates the privileges you have for the column. This value is displayed only if you use the FULL keyword.
trans-unit.target: 特权表示您对该列具有的特权。仅当您使用 FULL 关键字时，才显示此值。

trans-unit.source: ProcMgr runs on each PM node with only one taking an active role at a time, the others remaining in warm standby mode. This process manager is responsible for overall system health, resource monitoring, and PM node failover management.
trans-unit.target: ProcMgr在每个PM节点上运行，一次仅一个活跃角色，其他PM保持热备用模式。该流程管理器负责整体系统运行状况，资源监视和PM节点故障转移管理。

trans-unit.source: ProcMon runs on each node and is responsible for ensuring that the other required ColumnStore processes are started and automatically restarted as appropriate on that server. This in turn is started and monitored by the run.sh shell script which ensures it is restarted should it be killed. The run.sh script is invoked and automatically started by the columnstore systemd service at bootup time. This can also be utilized to restart the service on an individual node though generally it is preferred to use the mcsadmin stop, shutdown, and start commands from the PM1 node.
trans-unit.target: ProcMon在每个节点上运行，并负责确保其他必需的ColumnStore进程已启动，并在该服务器上适当地自动重新启动。反过来，它由run.sh shell脚本启动和监视，该脚本确保在被杀死时将其重新启动。在启动时，columnstore系统服务会调用run.sh脚本并自动将其启动。虽然通常最好使用PM1节点上的mcsadmin stop，shutdown和start命令，但也可以使用它在单个节点上重新启动服务。

trans-unit.source: Project Join Columns for Joins - Project additional join column(s) as needed for any join operations. Access of blocks is again based on row identifier, going directly to the block(s). See join tuning section ofperformance configuration for additional details on tuning this.
trans-unit.target: 用于联接的项目联接列 -根据任何联接操作的需要投影其他联接列。块的访问再次基于行标识符，直接进入块。有关进行此调整的更多详细信息，请参见性能配置的连接调整部分。

trans-unit.source: QUICK: Does not check rows in the table if there are no delete blocks.
trans-unit.target: 快速：如果没有删除块，则不检查表中的行。

trans-unit.source: Query Execution Times (startTime, endTime) Calculated as end time – start time.
trans-unit.target: 查询执行时间（startTime，endTime）计算为结束时间–开始时间。

trans-unit.source: ROW OPERATIONS:Information about the main thread, including the number and performance rate for each type of row operation.
trans-unit.target: ROW OPERATIONS：有关主线程的信息，包括每种类型的行操作的数量和性能比率。

trans-unit.source: Range:0 to 1/2 the size of the InnoDB buffer pool
trans-unit.target: 范围： InnoDB缓冲池大小的 0 到1/2

trans-unit.source: Rationale: Normally, one works with valid dynamic column blobs. Functions like COLUMN_CREATE, COLUMN_ADD, COLUMN_DELETE always return valid dynamic column blobs. However, if a dynamic column blob is accidentally truncated, or transcoded from one character set to another, it will be corrupted. This function can be used to check if a value in a blob field is a valid dynamic column blob.
trans-unit.target: 基本原理：通常，可以使用有效的动态列Blob。诸如COLUMN_CREATE，COLUMN_ADD，COLUMN_DELETE之类的函数始终会返回有效的动态列Blob。但是，如果动态列Blob被意外截断或从一个字符集转码为另一个字符集，它将被破坏。此函数可用于检查Blob字段中的值是否为有效的动态列Blob。

trans-unit.source: Rationale: Normally, one works with valid dynamic column blobs. Functions like COLUMN_CREATE, COLUMN_ADD, COLUMN_DELETE always return valid dynamic column blobs. However, if a dynamic column blob is accidentally truncated, or transcoded from one character set to another, it will be corrupted. This function can be used to check if a value in a blob field is a valid dynamic column blob.
trans-unit.target: 基本原理：通常，可以使用有效的动态列Blob。诸如 COLUMN_CREATE ， COLUMN_ADD ， COLUMN_DELETE 之类的函数始终会返回有效的动态列Blob。但是，如果动态列Blob被意外截断或从一个字符集转码为另一个字符集，它将被破坏。此函数可用于检查Blob字段中的值是否为有效的动态列Blob。

trans-unit.source: Readability. Once the WHERE clause contains more than two conditions, it becomes tedious to pick out the difference between business logic (only dates in the last two weeks) and relational logic (which fields relate clients to orders). Using the JOIN syntax with an ON clause makes the WHERE list shorter, and makes it very easy to see how tables relate to each other.
trans-unit.target: 可读性。一旦WHERE子句包含两个以上的条件，找出业务逻辑（仅过去两周的日期）和关系逻辑（这些字段将客户与订单相关）之间的区别就变得很繁琐。将JOIN语法与ON子句一起使用会使WHERE列表更短，并使查看表之间的关系非常容易。

trans-unit.source: ReferencedOIDs – ObjectIDs for the columns required by the query.
Referential Integrity: PBXT supports foreign key definitions, including cascaded updates and deletes.
trans-unit.target: 引用完整性： PBXT支持外键定义，包括级联的更新和删除。

trans-unit.source: Removed:MariaDB 10.0/XtraDB 5.6 - replaced with InnoDB flushing method from MySQL 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 删除：MariaDB 10.0 / XtraDB 5.6-由MySQL 5.6中的InnoDB刷新方法代替。

trans-unit.source: Row-level locking: When updating, PBXT uses row-level locking. Row-level locking is also used during SELECT FOR UPDATE.
trans-unit.target: 行级锁定：更新时，PBXT使用行级锁定。在SELECT FOR UPDATE期间也使用行级锁定。

trans-unit.source: Rows returned or affected (rows) -The number of rows returned for SELECT queries, or the number of rows affected by DML queries. Not valid for DDL and other query types.
trans-unit.target: 返回的行或受影响的行（行） -为SELECT查询返回的行数，或受DML查询影响的行数。对于DDL和其他查询类型无效。

trans-unit.source: SEMAPHORES: Threads waiting for a semaphore and stats on how the number of times threads have needed a spin or a wait on a mutex or rw-lock semaphore. If this number of threads is large, there may be I/O or contention issues. Reducing the size of the innodb_thread_concurrency system variable may help if contention is related to thread scheduling. Spin rounds per wait shows the number of spinlock rounds per OS wait for a mutex.
trans-unit.target: SEMAPHORES：等待信号量的线程以及有关线程如何需要旋转或等待互斥量或rw-lock信号量的次数的统计信息。如果线程数量很大，则可能存在I / O或争用问题。如果争用与线程调度有关，减小innodb_thread_concurrency系统变量的大小可能会有所帮助。 Spin rounds per wait 显示每个操作系统等待互斥锁的旋转锁次数。

Single Column Scan - Scan one or more Extents for a given column based on a single column predicate, including: =, <>, in (list), between, isnull, etc. See first scan section of performance configuration for additional details on tuning this.

trans-unit.source: Status: Shows the timestamp, monitor name and the number of seconds, or the elapsed time between the current time and the time the InnoDB Monitor output was last displayed. The per-second averages are based upon this time.
trans-unit.target: 状态：显示时间戳，监视器名称和秒数，或当前时间与InnoDB Monitor输出最后显示时间之间的经过时间。每秒平均值是基于该时间的。

trans-unit.source: Status: This field displays the following values if UNIV_DEBUG was defined at compilation time (for example, in include/univ.h in the InnoDB part of the source tree). Only the os_waits value is displayed if UNIV_DEBUG was not defined. Without UNIV_DEBUG, the information on which the output is based is insufficient to distinguish regular mutexes and mutexes that protect rw-locks (which allow multiple readers or a single writer). Consequently, the output may appear to contain multiple rows for the same mutex.
trans-unit.target: 状态：如果在编译时定义了 UNIV_DEBUG （例如，在源树的InnoDB部分的include / univ.h中），则此字段显示以下值。如果 UNIV_DEBUG 则仅显示 os_waits 值。如果没有 UNIV_DEBUG ，则输出所基于的信息不足以区分常规互斥锁和保护rw锁的互斥锁（允许多个读取器或单个写入器）。因此，输出可能看起来包含针对同一互斥锁的多个行。

trans-unit.source: TAS - Tuple Aggregation step : the process of receiving intermediate aggregation results at the UM from the PM nodes.
trans-unit.target: TAS-元组聚合步骤：在UM处从PM节点接收中间聚合结果的过程。

trans-unit.source: TCS = Tuple Constant Step: Process Constant Value Columns
trans-unit.target: TCS =元组常量步骤：处理常量值列

trans-unit.source: TNS - Tuple Annexation Step : Query result finishing, e.g. filling in constant columns, limit, order by and final distinct cases.
trans-unit.target: TNS-元组合并步骤：查询结果的完成情况，例如，填写常量列，限制，排序依据和最终不同的情况。

trans-unit.target: TUS =元组联合步骤：执行2个子查询的SQL联合。

trans-unit.source: Use case #1 -- time series. Perhaps the most common use case where PARTITIONing shines is in a dataset where "old" data is periodically deleted from the table. RANGE PARTITIONing by day (or other unit of time) lets you do a nearly instantaneous DROP PARTITION plus REORGANIZE PARTITION instead of a much slower DELETE. Much of this blog is focused on this use case. This use case is also discussed in Big DELETEs
trans-unit.target: 用例1-时间序列。可能是PARTITIONing发光的最常见用例是在数据集中，其中“旧”数据定期从表中删除。按天（或其他时间单位）对RANGE进行分区可以使您几乎立即执行DROP PARTITION加上REORGANIZE PARTITION，而不是慢得多的DELETE。本博客的大部分内容都针对此用例。大DELETE中也讨论了该用例

trans-unit.source: Use case #2 -- 2-D index. INDEXes are inherently one-dimensional. If you need two "ranges" in the WHERE clause, try to migrate one of them to PARTITIONing.
trans-unit.target: 用例2-2维索引。索引本质上是一维的。如果在WHERE子句中需要两个“范围”，请尝试将其中一个迁移到PARTITIONing。

See also Transportable Tablespaces for InnoDB Partitions That link talks about 5.7, but has a section "But how to do this in 5.6?"

trans-unit.source: Write-once: PBXT uses a log-based storage which makes it possible to write transactional data directly to the database, without first being writen to the transaction log.
trans-unit.target: 一次写入： PBXT使用基于日志的存储，这使将事务数据直接写入数据库成为可能，而无需先将其写入事务日志。

trans-unit.source: Writeset caching during state transfer. When a node is receiving a state transfer it cannot process and apply incoming writesets because it has no state to apply them to yet. Depending on a state transfer mechanism (e.g. mysqldump) the node that sends the state transfer may not be able to apply writesets as well. Thus they need to cache those writesets for a catch-up phase. Currently the writesets are cached in memory and, if the system runs out of memory either the state transfer will fail or the cluster will block waiting for the state transfer to end.
trans-unit.target: 状态传输期间的Writeset缓存。当节点接收状态转移时，它无法处理和应用传入的写集，因为它尚无状态可应用它们。根据状态转移机制（例如mysqldump），发送状态转移的节点也可能无法应用写集。因此，他们需要在追赶阶段中缓存那些写集。当前，写集被缓存在内存中，如果系统内存不足，状态传输将失败，或者群集将阻塞，等待状态传输结束。
